question: All are true regarding 'Positive health' in today's world except:-
exp: Concept of Positive Health: Perfect functioning of body and mind. Conceptualize health biologically, psychologically and socially. Depends on economic, social and cultural factors. Positive health remains a mirage due to constant change. - Hence option-4 is the answer.
opa: Dependent on social, economic and culture
opd: Changing behavior with respect to change in future

question: All of the following are "Utilization rates" except:-
exp: Health care delivery indicators Health care utilization indicators Doctor-population ratio Doctor-nurse ratio Population - bed ratio Population per health centre Population per bih attendant % fully immunised infants % pregnant women received ANC % population using contraceptives Bed occupancy rate Average length of stay Bed turnover ratio - Hence, option-1 is answer, as it comes under health care delivery indicators not utilization indicators.

question: Disease which shows cyclical trend:-
exp: Time Distribution of Disease: - Periodic fluctuations: 1. Cyclical Trend - Fluctuations in every few years Ex - Measles, Rubella, Influenza Measles every 2-3 years Rubella every 5-8 years Influenza show maximum cyclical trends d/t antigenic shift/drift 2. Seasonal Trend - Disease that increases every paicular season Ex - Malaria/Dengue in Rainy Season, I in winter Season 3. Epidemic Trend - Sho term fluctuations Ex-Food poisoning, Bhopal Gas tragedy 4. Secular Trend - Long term fluctuations Ex - Non-communicable disease ( CHD, HTN etc)
